B&B Hotel, the best hotel in Moshi, is l: B&B Hotel, the best hotel in Moshi, is located slightly outside the bustling city center of Moshi, Tanzania — near the base of majestic Mount Kilimanjaro. We're just 45 minutes from Kilimanjaro International Airport and 5 minutes from the city center — perfect for trekkers, safari adventurers, business travelers, and families alike.Our warm, welcoming staff is here to provide top-tier service, comfort, and hospitality.
Enjoy our spacious, fully-furnished room: Enjoy our spacious, fully-furnished rooms — available as singles, doubles, twins, or triples — each equipped with smart TVs, high-speed Wi-Fi, and views of Mount Kilimanjaro. Guests can relax in our shared lounge,savor local and international cuisine at our restaurant, and feel secure with 24/7 security, CCTV, and luggage storage. Free parking is also available on site.
Relax in shared lounges with high-speed: Relax in shared lounges with high-speed Wi-Fi, Smart TVs, and stunning Mount Kilimanjaro views.
Just 5 minutes from Moshi town and 45 mi: Just 5 minutes from Moshi town and 45 minutes from the airport — ideal for every kind of traveler.
24/7 security, CCTV, and helpful staff e: 24/7 security, CCTV, and helpful staff ensure your stay is safe, secure, and memorable.
